mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our goal goes beyond entertainment. Huyền Hoàng aims to break down the prejudice about the distance between the past and the present. More importantly, we sincerely nurture national pride and love for history, while encouraging players to develop soft skills so that future generations can connect with their roots in the most profound and meaningful way.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: We envision Huyền Hoàng as a pioneering brand in the field of cultural and heritage educational entertainment in Vietnam, setting a new standard for products that are not only entertaining but also nurture a love of history in the community. By combining modern technology with creativity, Huyền Hoàng wants to recreate history, making Vietnamese heritage values more attractive, inspiring and engaging, both domestically and internationally.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: M.ETA (Mystery – Education – Tradition – Art) is a startup project by 6 FPT University students. The main colors of this project are red-brown and yellow, conveying longevity and culture, inspired by the traditional Tam Quan gate, with the logo symbolizing Vietnamese culture and heritage. With the slogan "When History meet Adventure", we want to turn dry knowledge into an exciting journey, where Nguyen Dynasty culture and the spirit of "our nation must know our history" are vividly recreated.
